string.val: Dummy plug-in doesn't have the registrar lock operating ability.
Always reject domains registration. Domains can be marked as 'Registered' only manually.
Always reject domains transfer. Domains can be marked as 'Registered' only manually.
Always report error on NS synchronization. Name servers will never be marked as 'Synchronized with the Registrar'.
Domain registration via Dummy plug-in could not be completed. You should turn off the "Always reject domains registration" option in order to register domain or mark it as 'Registered' manually.
Domain transfer via Dummy plug-in could not be completed. You should turn off the "Always reject domains transfer" option in order to transfer domain or mark it as 'Registered' manually.

NS synchronization via Dummy plug-in could not be completed. You should turn off the "Always report error on NS synchronization option" in order to mak name servers as 'Synchronized with the Registrar'.
